mapper.insert: insert into BOOKING_PURCHASE(p_abprice,p_no,m_no,cookie_name,p_totprice,p_discount,coupon_code,m_phone,m_post_address,m_name,p_agreement,p_method) values(0,(booking_purchase_seq1.nextval+3),nvl((select m_no from booking_member where m_id=#{m_id}),0),#{cookie_name},#{p_totprice},#{p_discount},nvl(#{coupon_code},''),#{m_phone},#{m_post_address},#{m_name},#{p_agreement},#{p_method})

insert into booking_book_purchase_rel(isbn,p_amount,p_no) select isbn,cart_amount,p_no from booking_cart_rel c inner join booking_purchase p on c.m_no=p.m_no where p.p_no=(select max(p_no) from booking_purchase where m_no=(select m_no from booking_member where m_id=#{m_id}))
mapper.select: select isbn,b_title,b_abprice,b_pagesize from booking_book_data where isbn=#{isbn}
mapper.update: update booking_member set m_point=#{p_totprice}*0.01 where m_no=#{m_no}
mapper.select: select m_no,bc.coupon_name , bc.coupon_no, bc.coupon_discount_ratio from BOOKING_COUPON bc inner join booking_member_coupon_rel bcr on bc.coupon_no=bcr.coupon_no where m_no=(select m_no from booking_member where m_id=#{m_id})
